McMd::McExternalPerturbation< Interaction > Class Template Reference
Free Energy Perturbation

Detailed Description

template<class Interaction>
class McMd::McExternalPerturbation< Interaction >

A Perturbation in the external potential external parameter.

An McExternalPerturbation describes a Hamiltonian with a variable external parameter.
